messages.title: NHS Funding
messages.content: Labour and Tories refuse to commit to protecting NHS from cuts. Labour's financial mismanagement and Tory cuts have hit Oxford's services

messages.title: It's a two horse race here in Oxford West & Abingdon
messages.content: Lib Dems are fighting for every vote. Only the Lib Dems can beat the Tories here.

messages.title: Budget 2015: A missed opportunity
messages.content: Layla Moran would fight for a better deal for Oxford West & Abingdon

messages.title: I'll fight Tory School funding cuts
messages.content: Our area deserves better. I will always put our children first

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to protect NHS from cuts and improve services.
Opposition to Tory school funding cuts and a commitment to put children's interests first.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can beat the Tories here.

issues.education: Layla Moran will fight Tory school funding cuts.
issues.health: Lib Dems commit to protect NHS from cuts.

housing.content: Labour's financial mismanagement and Tory cuts have hit Oxford's services

images.caption: Photo of Layla Moran with supporters

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet focuses on a few key issues, mainly NHS funding and educational policies. It presents the election as a two-horse race between Lib Dem and the Tories, explicitly calling for tactical voting by the Lib Dems to beat the Tories.
